data.text:
Shared great memories and laughs with my long-time friend Buck Williams last night here in #RipCity at the Trail Blazers game. This Blazer legend and rebounding force always played the game hard. 

He belongs in the Hall of Fame. Period. Full stop. https://t.co/e176Y7L68e

I may never have played in the NBA. But I’ve always loved the game. 

And here in Oregon, I am not alone. https://t.co/1dAteuw5yN

Yet again Portland and Oregon are showing the country and world we live in hoops heaven. Just like when Portland beat out larger markets to land a WNBA franchise, another men’s NCAA regional next month and the Women’s Final Four in 2030. https://t.co/OymBCJcZyz
Great night for the best fans in the NBA. #RipCity was rocking last night at the Moda Center with another win for our young team on the rise. https://t.co/LV3566u5hw

Linn County delivered a clear message at the #2026townhall I co-hosted yesterday with @RepBynum — keep battling against the Trump administration treating the Bill of Rights like a doormat. 

Our message: We will prevail. https://t.co/MyGyV2oXoy

Met this weekend in east Multnomah County with local civil rights heroes advocating for children, parents & countless other immigrants from Latin America & Africa. 

What I heard about ICE & CBP terrorizing local communities is chilling. Not one more 💵 to these rogue agencies. https://t.co/KXqKip70tv
As always, the Boss rules. https://t.co/pNM8AazMVo

Last night’s #2026townhall in McMinnville covered a lot of ground. Lots of great questions in Yamhill County about the Epstein files, Trump’s threats to fair elections, the economic damage from Trump’s tariffs, ICE agents’ killings & horrific civil rights abuses. https://t.co/hN7FRY8572

Heading south down I-5 this morning from here in Portland to Linn County for today’s #2026townhall with @RepBynum. Our 10 am town hall at Linn-Benton Community College is open to all Oregonians.
https://t.co/20DgeV6i7k

Thanks to everybody in Polk County who came in on a sunny afternoon for yesterday’s #2026townhall. Great conversation here in Monmouth about the need to protect our elections from Trump’s lawless meddling, and to defend the First Amendment against his ICE agents’ attacks. https://t.co/9lxuxA9hC2
